title: How To Be A Citizen
description: Original broadcast date: December 4, 2020. The 2020 election saw historic voter turnout. But in a divided democracy, how else can we commit to our civic duties? This hour, Baratunde Thurston joins Manoush with ideas on how to citizen.

itunes:summary: This hour, Baratunde Thurston joins Manoush with ideas on how we can better commit to our civic duties.
